item.title: Marvel Rivals: How To Play Hawkeye
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Hawkeye Abilities Overview
  • How To Play Hawkeye In Marvel Rivals
  • How To Counter Hawkeye In Marvel Rivals
  • Best Team Composition For Hawkeye In Marvel Rivals

Hawkeye , the master Marksman, is available to play in Marvel Rivals. Fans of this competitive hero arena are wondering about his abilities, best team composition, and the best strategy to play this hero. Below are all the important details about Hawkeye's abilities, how to make the most of them in combat, and the best combos with other heroes.

Since Hawkeye is a ranged Duelist, he is a master of pinpointing targets from a long distance, and has the particularity of possessing the longest-ranged attack in the whole roster. To play this hero properly, players will require a certain degree of skill, as it is not easy to land a shot amid the mayhem of battle.

Hawkeye Abilities Overview

  • Piercing Arrow : A charged basic attack that shoots a projectile in an arcing line, and can cause severe precision damage.
  • Blast Arrow : A charged basic attack that loads three explosive arrows. These arrows land in a trident trajectory and explode upon impact, causing AoE damage.
  • Hunter's Sight : An Ultimate ability that boosts Hawkeye's reflexes for 10 seconds, allowing him to cause damage to enemies even if they are moving by targeting their afterimages. Landing a shot in any of the afterimages will transfer the damage to the corresponding enemies.
  • Crescent Slash : A lateral slash with the Katana that knocks back enemies and causes moderate damage.
  • Hypersonic Arrow : A charge-type ability that can knock down flying enemies, and inflicts Slow on targets hit by the AoE.
  • Ronin Slash : A Melee Attack that can also deflect incoming projectiles.
  • Skyward Leap : Double Jump in the air with great directional control.
  • Passive - Archer's Focus : Focusing the aim on an enemy improves Piercing Arrow's damage. The meter fills slowly as Hawkeye tracks down foes.
  • Team-Up Passive - Supersensory Vision (Black Widow) : When playing with Black Widow, Hawkeye's ultimate ability also grants the same buff to the player who is using her, allowing her to target enemy afterimages.

Hawkeye is a sniper, capable of causing tremendous damage and pinning down opponents thanks to his rapid fire. Since he is most vulnerable on the melee range, he is also equipped with several abilities like Crescent Slash and Skyward Leap, to get out of tricky situations.

His ultimate ability, Hunter's Sight, is tremendously broken. Most enemies won't even know what happens or why their Health depletes even if they're moving rapidly. Using this ability is the best way to counter fast rivals like Star-Lord, Spider-Man, Iron Fist, and Black Panther.

Hawkeye's passive, Archer's Focus, is especially designed for players who prefer a stealthier type of gameplay. Players can take the high ground and slowly track foes, to then unleash a powerful charged shot that can OHKO most heroes (or villains) in the game.

Hawkeye's primary ability, Piercing Shot, can be spammed. It will cause less damage, but offer a rapid-fire mode that will be useful to pin down opponents and cover allies retreating. It can also overwhelm Strategists easily, since these heroes are often squishier than Vanguards or Duelists.

How To Play Hawkeye In Marvel Rivals

Playing Hawkeye is not easy. His low health bar (250) makes him a glass-cannon of sorts, and his poor mobility compared to other Duelists makes him a favorite target of heroes like Wolverine, Iron Fist, and Venom, who prefer to overwhelm their opponents at close range. The ideal way to play this hero is by keeping distance at all times, and searching for high-ground areas where Hawkeye can roost and do his magic.

Hawkeye can be a true menace for heroes like Iron Man and Storm, who trust their aerial privileges to sow terror among the other grounded heroes. A well-placed Hypersonic Arrow will send them back to spawn, and secure important objectives for the team.

Related
Are Any Characters Feeling Overpowered in Marvel Rivals So Far?

I haven't had a chance to try them all out just yet. I mean, there are 33 from launch after all, but which ones are feeling OP'd? So far, I'd say Punisher is pretty, well, punishing, but that might have just been me in a bit of good form. I have been getting properly beaten up by Iron Fist though. What's his beef with me?!

Having a Hawkeye on the team means two things: damage output, and coverage . When playing to secure objectives, keep Hawkeye at mid-range with rapid fire and using Blast Arrows to separate Vanguards from Strategists. This is the best strategy to secure objectives. When other active rangers like Black Widow, Loki, or Psylocke are pursuing the team's Strategists, Hawkeye can step into Sniping mode and, using his passive, can quickly overwhelm them to facilitate their escape.

Here's a detailed Hawkeye strategy for each of the different game modes in Marvel Rivals.

Convoy Mode

During Defense, establish a privileged position with a clear view of the objective. Getting to high ground is way more important than in other game modes, since there's a reduced combat area where players using Hawkeye can focus their attacks. Always pinpoint high-value targets like Strategists (Healers) and Ranged Duelists (Snipers) and take them down first. Scurry to the backline of the team when threatened by Melee Duelists. Don't try to fight them alone.

During Offense, try to outflank the rival team a nd use rapid shot mode to destroy Strategists and cause chaos among the enemies. If there's a chance, get into a sniping roost, but ideally, players should stay away from enemy fire and look for cover instead. Then gain the upper hand by accompanying the ally frontliners with Blast Arrow and Hypersonic Arrow to disrupt the enemy team's Vanguards.

Domination Mode

This game mode puts Hawkeye at a great disadvantage, since it forces him to play in close-range situations where he underperforms. In this game mode, the team needs to capture a position and hold it until it reaches 100%.

Hawkeye players can do either one of two things here. They can either get to high ground and snipe, or remain close to the target and prevent the enemy team from flooding the target area, creating a choking point alongside the Vanguards. In both cases, Hawkeye is vulnerable, so keeping an eye out for flanker Duelists is a must.

Convergence Mode

During Defense, Hawkeye will have plenty of time to secure a privileged position, since Defenders can move first. Try to reach the high ground and carefully select an escape route in case the enemy team sends a Duelist to counter him.

During Offense, remain in the backline and support the team with suppression fire. Target Duelists, Strategist, then Vanguards in that order. High-priority targets such as Jeff (the Land Shark), Magick , Iron Fist, and Psylocke need to go down first, so keep an eye out for them.

Hawkeye's skills work best when Roosted in a high-ground position. Take advantage of the terrain during fights, but remember that most terrains (including balconies, platforms, and such) can be destroyed. Keep an eye out for heroes like Spider-Man, Venom, Moon Knight, and Iron Fist. They will likely target Hawkeye as a priority, and they have lots of mobility skills that allow them to climb.

How To Counter Hawkeye In Marvel Rivals

As most players might have guessed by reading this guide, Hawkeye is quite hard to control. His effectiveness depends mostly on two factors: team composition and positioning. The best way to counter a good Hawkeye player is to send another Duelist with high mobility to harass him and prevent him from taking advantage of high ground and sniping positions.

Iron Fist works like a charm with his high resilience and flurry of blows, but Wolverine , Venom , Spider-Man , and Moon Knight are also primary Hawkeye counters. At the beginning of each round, Hawkeye will try to outflank the allies, especially Strategists and other ranger Duelists. The best courses of action in each game mode are as follows:

Convoy Mode

During Offense, Hawyeke will be either in an elevated position or behind the enemy lines. Don't chase him down yet, but try to use one of the Duelists to flank and harass him to prevent him from gaining the upper hand. Psylocke's infiltration skills and Spider-Man's high mobility can be a total menace.

During Defense, Hawkeye will try to outflank the team, so spread out in groups of three and look for the pathway he will take to try this strategy, then jump on him and send him to respawn. Rinse and repeat.

Domination Mode

Use overwhelm tactics. Hawkeye will be at a great disadvantage in this game mode, and will have to position himself close to the objective area. Wolverine with his fast lunges and Iron Fist with his overwhelming attack speed will be his worst nightmare, but Captain America and Psylocke can do the trick as well.

Convergence Mode

During Offense, Hawyeke will become a living turret and harass Strategists as much as possible . Use Psylocke, Venom, or Spider-Man to flank him, then take this chance to snipe him down with other ranged heroes, such as Black Widow.

During Defense, Hawkeye will try to suppress the frontline with rapid fire and its AoE skills. Avoid bringing flying heroes into the fight, as they will be shot down in no time. Instead, use Wolverine, Moon Knight, or Spider-Man to separate the enemy vanguard and turn Hawkeye into an easier target for the rest of the Duelists on the team.

Remember that Hawkeye is not defenseless at melee range, and can deflect mid-range attacks easily. So, bait him to use his Crescent Slash and Skyward Leap and he will be absolutely vulnerable to overwhelm tactics.

Best Team Composition For Hawkeye In Marvel Rivals

Hawkeye greatly benefits from having Black Widow on his team. He can share his Ultimate Ability with Natasha, turning her into an even more lethal Sniper than she already is. On the other hand, he also needs quite a lot of protection during certain game modes.

Vanguards like Thor , Captain America , Venom , Penny Parker , or Bruce Banner / Hulk are a must-have to make their abilities shine. On the other hand, if Hawkeye players want to go into full turret mode and destroy everything, they should associate with Rocket Raccoon. Thanks to his C.Y.A. damage boost ability, Hawkeye turns into a team destroyer for a few seconds and can wipe an entire team if left unattended.

item.title: Back 4 Blood 2 Needs One Huge Feature at Launch That the First Game Skipped
item.description:
The co-op shooter Back 4 Blood was touted as a spiritual successor to the Left 4 Dead series, but it sadly wasn't able to meet the high-quality bar of its predecessors. Although it was developed by the same studio behind L4D , Turtle Rock Games, Back 4 Blood was met with somewhat mixed reviews upon its release. The game did have its highlights, but it was criticized by many for its map design, difficulty scaling, limited content, and perceived lack of innovation. Despite its divisive critical reception, Back 4 Blood was still able to attract a sizable audience. Only two weeks after its October 2021 launch, it garnered a total of 6 million players across all platforms, which was quite impressive.

Back 4 Blood 's success, however, was ultimately short-lived. In early 2023, Turtle Rock Games announced that it would no longer be releasing new content for B4B , since it didn't have enough employees to support the game post-launch for an extended period of time. Most of the developers at the studio, it said, had moved on to a new project. While Turtle Rock hasn't revealed what its next game will be, recent rumors seem to suggest that the company is working on a follow-up to Back 4 Blood . That may come as a surprise to some, since many gamers viewed the 2021 co-op shooter as a disappointment, but Turtle Rock may have the opportunity to improve on certain aspects of the original B4B in a hypothetical follow-up.

Back 4 Blood 2 Should Build Upon the Foundation of Its Predecessor

A Follow-Up to Back 4 Blood is Apparently in the Works, According to New Rumors

The rumors about a potential Back 4 Blood sequel first began popping up last year. In July 2023, Turtle Rock Games started to recruit employees for its next AAA project. In many of the job listings posted on its website, the company stated that it was searching for developers who were fans of co-op, FPS, and multiplayer games, and had experience with first-person games that featured shooting or melee combat. While they didn't explicitly allude to anything, the requirements mentioned for these jobs led many to speculate that Turtle Rock was working on Back 4 Blood 2 or, at least, another Left 4 Dead -style co-op game.

This speculation was further compounded by a leak from earlier this year. The news outlet MP1ST recently reported that the resume of a stuntman by the name of Jesse Hutch seemingly confirmed that a Back 4 Blood sequel was in development. Hutch, who was involved with the original B4B , was apparently a lead performer in an upcoming Turtle Rock game that's tentatively titled Gobi 2 . For those who don't know, Gobi was the codename that Turtle Rock used for the first Back 4 Blood . Putting two and two together, it seems reasonable to conclude that Gobi 2 is the codename for a B4B sequel.

Unlike The Original B4B, Back 4 Blood 2 Needs to Have Solo Offline Support on Day-One

If Back 4 Blood 2 really does exist, then Turtle Rock should take it upon itself to ensure that the game launches in a feature-complete state, unlike its predecessor. When the original Back 4 Blood was released, it lacked an offline mode, which was a staple of the Left 4 Dead games. For many players who tried it out on day one, it was a big disappointment that the game couldn’t be played solo without a persistent internet connection. To Turtle Rock's credit, an offline mode was added to B4B in a post-launch update, but in some gamers' eyes, it was too little, too late.

Multiplayer shooters are all the rage these days, but many gamers still prefer to play games by themselves. That's why, if B4B 2 is ever released, it needs to give players the option to play with A.I. teammates instead of other people. A solo mode in a hypothetical Back 4 Blood sequel should also have proper progression systems on day one so that gamers can still have an offline experience that's at least somewhat comparable to playing with friends.

item.title: Pokemon Unite Getting New Game Mode, But There's a Catch
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • Pokemon Unite features fan-favorite Pokemon and allows customization with "Holowear."
  • According to a leak, Pokemon Unite is introducing a new Auto-Battler mode.
  • The leaked mode is reportedly only coming to China for now.

Pokemon Unite is reportedly getting a new game mode in the form of an auto-battler, but only players in China can play it. Pokemon Unite is the Pokemon Company’s MOBA title for Nintendo Switch and mobile devices. The game is a simplified take on the genre, with many ways to customize the player’s gaming experience.

Pokemon Unite came out on July 21, 2021, and was received well among most Pokemon fans. Pokemon Unite features many fan-favorite Pokemon, both legendary and more common ones. Players can customize their Pokemon’s looks with "Holowear," unique outfits for each monster. In addition, each Pokemon has its own role, from Defender to Attacker, All-Rounders, and more.

Centro LEAKS on Twitter has revealed promo artwork provided by Chico Eevee that portrays an “Auto Chess” mode. Auto Chess is similar to Team Fight Tactics in League of Legends . Auto Chess has been a popular genre that sprouted from MOBA-like games. Also known as an “Auto Battler,” players summon characters to fight one another in a tiny arena. Each “Auto Battler” has its own unique take on the genre, with specific heroes included, or in this case, Pokemon. Even though this game mode seems to be coming soon, there’s a catch, with it only being available in China for the time being.

Pokemon Unite Leak Reveals Auto-Battler Mode

Pokemon Unite recently released three new Pokemon, with Armarouge, Darkrai, and Psyduck being the most recent additions to the game. Armarouge is an Attacker with ranged attacks; Darkrai is a Speedster with melee attacks; and Psyduck is a Supporter type with a ranged move set that's easy to use for new players. Unlike most Pokemon in Unite , Psyduck does not evolve into its evolution: Golduck.

Pokemon Unite continues to have exciting releases after three years of being live. This year, during the third anniversary, Pokemon Unite revealed a popular legendary Pokemon coming to the game. Ho-oh, the box art legendary Pokemon for Pokemon Gold Version from 1999 for the original Game Boy, is now playable in the MOBA. Sporting the Defender role, Ho-oh is a ranged fighter with an easy-to-master playstyle. He is best in the bottom lane, with the top lane also a good option to play in. As of August 11, 2024, players can buy Ho-Oh for 15,000 Aeos Coins or 840 Aeos Gems. Previously, it was only accessible through the Divine Forest Challenge event that lasted from July 19 to August 12. Players can enjoy Pokemon Unite for free, and it will be interesting to see if the leaked new auto-battler mode comes to more regions in the future.

item.title: Roblox: Swordburst 3 Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Swordburst 3 is a well-made RPG with an open world, interesting and diverse mechanics, and an immersive setting that you probably won't see in other Roblox experiences. Here, you have to become a hero and save the world, but first of all, there are a lot of enemies, challenges, and bosses waiting for you.

Although the progression process in the game is pleasant, you can make it even easier by redeeming Swordburst 3 codes. Each code offers generous rewards such as currency or resources that will definitely come in handy, so hurry up.

Updated December 8, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: No active codes are available right now, but we’re keeping a close eye on everything. Keep this guide handy for updates when new codes are released.

All Swordburst 3 Codes

Working Swordburst 3 Codes

  • There are currently no active codes.

Expired Swordburst 3 Codes

  • CRYSTAL - Redeem this code to get Crystal Key.
  • INFERNUM - Redeem this code to get the Icy Key.

Swordburst 3 codes are an optional feature that you can use to get certain benefits that will help in your development. Usually, the rewards from the codes are resources and currency that will definitely not be superfluous during your adventures, so if you are looking for an easy and fast method of farming, this is for you.

How to Redeem Codes for Swordburst 3

Swordburst 3 's redemption system is as simple as in most other Roblox experiences. But if you're an inexperienced player and don't understand how to do it or can't find the right option, you can follow these steps:

  • Launch Swordburst 3 .
  • Pay attention to the right side of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in a column. Among them, interact with the last one, which says Menu.
  • After doing this, several buttons will appear on the screen in two rows. Now, click the first button in the second row, which says Rewords.
  • This will open a menu with several different options. At the bottom of the menu, you will see a section with an input field and a gray Claim button next to it. Now, enter manually, or better yet, copy and paste one of the above codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click the Claim button, which will turn green after you enter the code, to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification at the top of the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Swordburst 3 Codes

Monitoring official social media is the most effective way to find more Swordburst 3 codes. Here, along with other content, developers often share Roblox codes, so be careful not to miss them:

  • Official Swordburst 3 Roblox group.
  • Official Swordburst 3 game page.
  • Official Swordburst 3 Discord server.
  • Official Swordburst 3 X account.

item.title: Roblox: Marble Run Tycoon 2 Codes (December 2024)
item.description:
Marble Run Tycoon 2 is a Roblox game that will fulfill the childhood dream of many players to become the owner of a sweets factory. In addition, the factory is not boring at all because all the sweets here roll down large pipes like in a water park, and it is very interesting to watch. Over time, you will open new conveyors and earn more money, and the factory will gradually turn into a huge castle. However, progress is very slow in the beginning, and it would be good to speed it up. Of course, you can spend some Robux, but it is not necessary. You can redeem Marble Run Tycoon 2 codes and get cash for free.

Updated December 8, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: With these codes, you can unlock rewards that can give you a boost. Be one step ahead of other players in the game.

All Marble Run Tycoon 2 Codes

Working Marble Run Tycoon 2 Codes

  • 300KGROUP - Enter this code to get 3,000 cash.
  • 50KLIKES - Enter this code to get 5,000 cash.
  • UPDATE5 - Enter this code to get 250 cash.
  • REBIRTH - Enter this code to get 1,000 cash.
  • 20KLIKES - Enter this code to get 2,000 cash.
  • TOYS - Enter this code to get 500 cash.
  • CANDY - Enter this code to get 250 cash.
  • PIRATE - Enter this code to get 200 cash.
  • NotMe - Enter this code to get 100 cash.
  • MARBLE - Enter this code to get 100 cash.
  • Lunargames - Enter this code to get 100 cash.
  • books - Enter this code to get 50 cash.

Expired Marble Run Tycoon 2 Codes

  • 10KLIKES
  • UPDATE1
  • 500LIKES

How to Redeem Codes in Marble Run Tycoon 2

If you are an experienced player, you probably know how to redeem codes in Roblox games. Accordingly, you shouldn't have any problems with Marble Run Tycoon 2 because you just need to find the settings that are always in the interface. However, players who are not yet very familiar with such games may get confused. Therefore, we have created a guide explaining how to redeem codes in Marble Run Tycoon 2 .

  • Open Roblox and launch Marble Run Tycoon 2 .
  • Pay attention to the block of six buttons on the left side of the screen. Click the purple Settings button.
  • Below the Settings window, there is a pink Codes button.
  • In the pink field, paste the code from the list of working codes and click Confirm.

Remember that some codes may expire over time. Therefore, you need to redeem them quickly to get the rewards.

How to Get More Marble Run Tycoon 2 Codes

If you want more new Roblox codes, our website can help you with that. We regularly add new guides and update them so that you can be one of the first to get rewards. Therefore, we recommend that you bookmark this guide in your browser by pressing Ctrl + D. If you would like to visit the official web resources of the Marble Run Tycoon 2 developers, you can do so by following the links below:

  • Marble Run Tycoon 2 Roblox group
  • Marble Run Tycoon 2 Discord server
  • Marble Run Tycoon 2 X page
